html:
4.10.19  8:09 pm   Are you on the "Deep Pockets" tour?

     no

4.10.19  8:01 pm   Do you watch the deleted scenes?

     yes, with an extra respectful grain of salt and understanding that they might not have had the proper editing treatment (might be missing the music, etc), and also with the understanding that they might have been simply cut because they weren't strong enough

4.10.19  7:59 pm   do you take requests?

     in some ways

4.10.19  7:58 pm   how did you find the right guitar and piano?

     i never found the right guitar, but the right piano i found in the local huge music chain retailer

4.10.19  6:33 pm   what are the different ways of holding drumsticks and how do you do them

     you can surely find youtube tutorials on it, they are called "matched grip" and "traditional grip"

4.10.19  5:51 pm   In La de da can you please tell me what the fuck did you mean by "it's the end of the world and I just can't wait"?

     that line seemed to fit like a glove in that verse

     In the Genius annotation you said that kim and trump were having a Twitter feud.Can you link that feud if possible?

     i have never made any annotations on Genius

4.10.19  5:22 pm   Are you ever going to talk about Velcro ?

     sometimes i am overwhelmed at the amount of stuff to talk about. i hope to talk about as much as i can

4.10.19  4:46 pm   Do you have any tips for being an somewhat, not completley useless adult person? If yes, please write it in the response to this question. Hope you have a nice day :-)

     just be thankful you don't feel used

4.10.19  4:32 pm   as a kid, before you learned the names of the chords, would you correlate them to pieces you had heard? (e.g. Bb - the "star wars" chord)

     i knew the names of chords very early, at least the easily namable ones

4.10.19  3:49 pm   I really like your songs, but the two history videos took a lot of effort to understand (even though I understood the humor the first time I watched). Am I just dumb?

     no, they are about topics probably much too big for 1 video

4.10.19  2:11 pm   2.5.18 6:43 pm are there actually people who do this?

     haven't thought about it

      how can i avoid becoming one?

     i don't know

4.10.19  2:04 pm   i read about you in a magazine

     fair enough

4.10.19  1:57 pm   Do What You Want To Do is a great song, what would you say the purpose of it is?

     what is your purpose in listening to it

4.10.19  1:27 pm   Have you ever asked yourself why people ask you weird questions sometimes?

     i already know

4.10.19  1:07 pm   Why are you so secretive?

     because i have already said way too much

4.10.19  1:03 pm   What are your thoughts on the frozen corpses forever resting on Everest?

     i don't normally think about them

4.10.19  11:41 am   did you write Got to Know What's Goin On so close to the bottom of your range on purpose?

     actually below, but no

      did you have to move it?

     yes, up 1 half step

4.10.19  11:02 am   do you like trains

     wish they were stronger, but yes

4.10.19  10:26 am   what are these things on top of the anagrams (3.23.19 m:3.23.19 p:4.10.19)

     the date it was requested, the date it was made/solved, the date it was posted

4.10.19  10:04 am   worst thing you've done?

     didn't do a thing bad enough

4.10.19  9:38 am   these questions are hard

     sometimes the easiest ones are the hardest

4.10.19  9:23 am   do you like the sound of your own voice?

     my job is to make it as good as possible and also contextualize it as good as possible

4.10.19  7:47 am   what was the first digital video you ever made primarily about

     learning how to do it

4.10.19  6:49 am   do you SLAP the BASS?

     usually not

4.10.19  6:08 am   what's your view on solipsism?

     never heard of it until this questions page

4.10.19  4:28 am   what are your opinions on iceland

     it is closer than you think

4.10.19  3:39 am   last note i can see is "1.31.19 6:11 pm" on top (and the one below it is "12.21.18 3:59 am"). is that about right

     those should be at the top, because they were written the most recently out of any of the ones on the page currently

4.10.19  3:33 am   Hey, i just want to tell you that if you have a writer's block or something that's ok :)

     i do not

4.10.19  3:25 am   I just stepped on LEGO with bare feet.

     why

4.10.19  2:29 am   in which hour are you scheduled to be cool in

     4:42 AM - 5:42 AM

4.10.19  2:21 am   what's the best feeling in the world?

     making a world

4.10.19  2:01 am   Do you believe in bees?

     they are hard to believe, but yes

4.10.19  1:11 am   I have an interesting question to ask

     well, you came to the right place

4.9.19  11:48 pm   how to be cute

     impossible

4.9.19  11:38 pm   why is music so good?

     to hopefully *influence* you

4.9.19  10:24 pm   hey man, I found some cookies in my couch, would you like some?

     no

4.9.19  9:55 pm   favorite Ringo Starr moment?

     https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hV8JFj17AtY

4.9.19  9:54 pm   What is the aim of life?

     more life!!!

     Do you have one?

     yes, and more

4.9.19  9:40 pm   I'm so worried about things i hold dear to me, mostly about my family. Like I am constantly experiencing impending doom that something will happen to them, or that they might be going down the wrong track or things like that. Other things too, but it's mostly my family for some reason. my fear isn't entirely unjustified either. I feel like the only escape I have from this is to be creating something, which is kinda cool but should creativity really be used as a crutch?

     isn't that more like a staircase

      I don't mean to think of it in this way but I kinda can't help it and it's causing a block I think for quite a while (because my natural default is to create and it's been happening less) I don't try to make things for this reason alone (or at all), but it definitely is nice to escape into abstractland.

     you could use abstractland constructively. it is an asset

      Is this normal?

     sure

      Should I be wary of creating for this reason?

     too late, you already created a huge amount already just discussing your fears

      Should I create less?

     probably not possible

      Should I create more?

     just try to aim it in some different directions. create some new farms. ...... etc

      I dunno why I'm asking you you just seem pretty cool and btw don't mind the guy who asked about the self help questions, I think you are just doing a good thing for people. Thanks.

4.9.19  9:13 pm   For my biology class my group and I analyzed the DNA of a virus that has never been studied before (there are bazillions of viruses we've never studied it's crazy). It's a virus that kills a certain type of bacteria but it doesn't do anything to humans. My group gets to give the virus an official name-do you have any suggestions for what we should name it?? 

     My New Virus

4.9.19  7:34 pm   If you were to ever translate one of your songs into another language, would you worry more about keeping an accurate translation or having it sound nice in the new language?

     got to get that grand slam and do both. need a re-write

4.9.19  6:54 pm   how do you deal with intolerance?

     option 1, tolerate the intolerance. or 2, use more intolerance (do not tolerate the intolerance, thereby adding more intolerance)

4.9.19  6:19 pm   What do you do to cope when you're in over your head?

     start a new novellete series about your experiences

      I'm doing a lot of really cool shit but I've frolicked way too hard.

4.9.19  6:03 pm   Have you ever actually eaten marshmallow cranberry pie?

     no

      If so, how did it taste?

4.9.19  5:55 pm   can you answer this question by anagraming it?

     yes but not on this page

4.9.19  5:28 pm   what's the current Schedule? 

     bad

4.9.19  4:31 pm   are there certain cases where you prefer using matched rather than traditional grip

     crossstick (the loud snare click thing). and with the stick backwards. so psychologically if i'm holding matched then the left stick needs to be backwards, and it probably means i was just doing crossstick clicks or am about to

4.9.19  2:34 pm   Is it hard to be THE Bill Wurtz?

     yes

4.9.19  1:36 pm   do you think there was complex life on venus before the planet dried out

     seems plausible

4.9.19  1:24 pm   I realized that words like feel, pile, tale, boil, and fool are 2 syllables. Feel for example is pronounced "fee-ohl" and tale/tail is pronounced "tey-ohl" but in songs and poems, I often see these words to be counted as 1 syllable. So I was wondering when you write lyrics, do you count these words as 1 or 2 syllables?

     it's possible and fun to count those and many more words as 1, 2, 3, or many more syllables. it's also fun to count much longer words as 1 syllable. that's one of the more fun aspects of songwriting, i think
